articles.author: FLOLiO
articles.description: The term “peer-to-peer” means one-on-one — and it’s perfectly suited to the computing world. In a peer-to-peer network, each node is both a client and a server. There is no top-down hierarchy where nodes are clients and servers; instead, each node is an autonomous agent that responds to centralized requests. The peer-to-peer network is one [...]
